doc.field: Series D.III. New York City Buildings, Parks and Other Cityscapes (2002 and later)
Series D.III. New York City Buildings, Parks and Other Cityscapes (2002 and later)
Manhattan skyline and Queens/Long Island City, from Long Island Expressway (17 photos + 2 emails)
Manhattan skyline and Queens/Long Island City, from Long Island Expressway (17 photos + 2 emails)

Views from the LIE southwest toward the Freedom Tower (Lower Manhattan) or west into Midtown, with billboards for the lottery and Broadway show "Hamilton" in some. Some views taken closer to the Midtown Tunnel that include views of construction in Long Island City, the Edward Koch Queensboro Bridge/59th Street Bridge, and midtown skyline. Taken in traffic on the LIE so provides car traffic/commuter view in some.
